attributes.action: Supermarket employees to be prioritised for Covid-19 Vaccine
attributes.additional_details: Supermarket employees are at risk from infection as they are in direct daily contact with the public.  Supermarkets are ideal conditions for Covid-19 to spread as not all members of the public follow Covid-19 rules such as social distancing, hand sanitisation or wear a face covering (excluding those who are exempt for medical reasons.)  Supermarket employees are at very high risk of contracting Covid-19.  We feel like the forgotten "key workers" by this government.
attributes.background: We would like supermarket employees to be prioritised along with the vunerable, NHS staff and care staff for a Covid-19 vaccine

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/567426
